entry.title: Developer Portal goes live!
entry.summary: The rest of the site will be entirely devoted to documenting our projects. Please take your time, stay a while, and look not just at the explanatory sections and technical definitions, but also the examples. We have certain style and ergonomic approach which we hope comes across in our documentation. Our goal in setting up this site was to convey the identity of our products and the values of our team, rather than just a functional or transactional set of "user's manuals." This documentation is yours, though, not just in the sense that we wrote it for you-- feel free to request "features" and "fixes" of it!

entry.title: Introducing DIDKit
entry.summary: In order to better work with decentralized identifiers and verifiable credentials, we’re working on DIDKit.
